trait.name: Superior Invisibility
entries: The fox magically turns invisible until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the fox wears or carries is invisible with it.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

A furry snake with the head of a fox. A curious creature, it avidly seeks out any knowledge it can get, hoarding it like currency. It is reluctant to share its vast knowledge, though will do so if given information of equal value or if it takes a liking to someone with the same curiosity as itself.
These creatures are popular familiars of Onmyouji due to the knowledge they provide and their utterly adorable appearance (though the pipe foxes think of their appearance as 'dignified').
